segments.text: I ’ m hungry , let ’ s grab a bite to eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! How about we go home and prepare a couple of sandwiches ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nah ! Let ’ s go get a burger and fries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All you ever do is have unhealthy fast food Pizza , fries , burgers and hot dogs ! You have to start eating better !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you talking about ? I have salads some times .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah right ! I ’ m serious ! You should also cut down on your sugar intake as well . You drink carbonated drinks that are high in fructose syrup ! It ’ s really not healthy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine ! I ’ ll start drinking and having home cooked meals that are low in fat . Are you happy now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a start , but I ’ ll be happy when I see you stick to your promise !
segments.speaker: S2
